name: Eclipastie

screenshots.caption: Select a file to copy paste content to pastebin
Use the context menu to copy and paste text to pastebin
See the paste result directly in the eclipse browser

short_description: Eclipastie is an open source Eclipse (3.3+) plugin (EPL license) which seamlessly copy and pastes text from within Eclipse to pastebins like Pastie (http://pastie.org) or LodgeIt (http://paste.pocoo.org/)
